code: import axiosAuth from'../axiosAuth';export var LISTINGS_LOAD_START='LISTINGS_LOAD_START';export var LISTINGS_LOAD_SUCCESS='LISTINGS_LOAD_SUCCESS';export var LISTINGS_LOAD_FAILURE='LISTINGS_LOAD_FAILURE';export var LISTING_ADD_SUCCESS='LISTING_ADD_SUCCESS';export var LISTING_ADD_FAILURE='LISTING_ADD_FAILURE';export var getListings=function getListings(){return function(dispatch){axiosAuth().get('/getListings').then(function(res){console.log(res.data);dispatch({type:LISTINGS_LOAD_SUCCESS,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);dispatch({type:LISTINGS_LOAD_FAILURE,payload:'error loading data'});});};};export var addListing=function addListing(listing){return function(dispatch){console.log(listing);axiosAuth().post('/listings',listing).then(function(res){console.log(res.data);dispatch({type:LISTING_ADD_SUCCESS,payload:listing});}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);dispatch({type:LISTING_ADD_FAILURE,payload:'error adding data'});});};};
